creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of three young women seated on a striped couch with a plant in front of a window in background; woman at center holds her hands palm up and looks at woman at right
inscription: on back in pencil: Three Old Friends
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Reunion of Lifelong Friends
